title: Get all TRACK LAYOUT-has-lap-time Relationships
description:
* A list of all ›has-lap-time‹ relationships for the selected TRACK LAYOUT is returned when there exists at least one of them. -> Status Code \`200\`
* Each item in the list contains the relationship ID and the two node IDs, but not the nodes itself.
* An empty list is returned when no ›has-lap-time‹ relationship exists. -> Status Code \`200\`
* Requests with invalid ID are rejected. This can happen when there exists no node with the given ID or it is not a TRACK LAYOUT. -> Status Code \`404\`
